name: SafetyMoment
0:
”Alexa ask safety moment to share a safety tip”
”ask Safety moment to tell me a safety moment”
”ask safety moment to share a tip”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: safety moment
des: Safety Moment app speaks a unique random safety moment when asked. This can be used as an icebreaker for your safety meetings. Can be used to teach kids about safety - one safety moment at a time. Can also be used by the HSE department for safety awareness.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
